quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: When I told them I was suicidal, they didn’t even log it properly.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, I remember you told me that, and I raised it with them.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Raised it isn’t the same as making sure it’s recorded.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: You’re right, it should have been logged straight away.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But because it wasn’t, they can deny it later.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and that’s why I’ve pushed again for proper logging going forward.

contradictions.issue: Suicidal disclosure not logged properly; advocate concedes failure but only promises 'pushing again'
